sentences.en: Create an LDAP realm with lockout.
sentences.cn: 创建带有锁定功能的ldap域。

sentences.en: That lockout shortened to the season to 50 games.
sentences.cn: 那次停摆，赛季被缩减到50场比赛。

sentences.en: Well, I know you are a huge basketball fan. This lockout, this is really depressing.
sentences.cn: 好的，您是铁杆篮球迷，这次停摆肯定让您郁闷吧。
